verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> concerning the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, or <S%H7650>swear<s%> an <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H631>bind<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> with a <S%H632>bond<s%>; he shall not <S%H2490>break<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>, he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that <S%H3318>proceedeth<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

If a <S%H802>woman<s%> also <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H631>bind<s%> herself by a <S%H632>bond<s%>, being in her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in her <S%H5271>youth<s%>;

And her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> her <S%H5088>vow<s%>, and her <S%H632>bond<s%> wherewith she hath <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and her <S%H1>father<s%> shall hold his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her: then all her <S%H5088>vows<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>, and every <S%H632>bond<s%> wherewith she hath <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>.

But if her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5106>disallow<s%> her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heareth<s%>; not any of her <S%H5088>vows<s%>, or of her <S%H632>bonds<s%> wherewith she hath <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%>, shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5545>forgive<s%> her, because her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5106>disallowed<s%> her.
And if she had at all an <S%H376>husband<s%>, when she <S%H5088>vowed<s%>, or <S%H4008>uttered<s%> ought out of her <S%H8193>lips<s%>, wherewith she <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%>;

And her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, and held his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heard<s%> it: then her <S%H5088>vows<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>, and her <S%H632>bonds<s%> wherewith she <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>.

But if her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H5106>disallowed<s%> her on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heard<s%> it; then he shall make her vow which she <S%H5088>vowed<s%>, and that which she <S%H4008>uttered<s%> with her <S%H8193>lips<s%>, wherewith she <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%>, of none <S%H6565>effect<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5545>forgive<s%> her.
But every <S%H5088>vow<s%> of a <S%H490>widow<s%>, and of her that is <S%H1644>divorced<s%>, wherewith they have <S%H631>bound<s%> their <S%H5315>souls<s%>, shall <S%H6965>stand<s%> against her.
And if she <S%H5087>vowed<s%> in her <S%H376>husband's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, or <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> by a <S%H632>bond<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath<s%>;

And her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, and held his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her, and <S%H5106>disallowed<s%> her not: then all her <S%H5088>vows<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>, and every <S%H632>bond<s%> wherewith she <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>.

But if her <S%H376>husband<s%> hath <S%H6565>utterly<s%> made them <S%H6565>void<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H8085>heard<s%> them; then whatsoever <S%H4161>proceeded<s%> out of her <S%H8193>lips<s%> concerning her <S%H5088>vows<s%>, or concerning the <S%H632>bond<s%> of her <S%H5315>soul<s%>, shall not <S%H6965>stand<s%>: her <S%H376>husband<s%> hath made them <S%H6565>void<s%>; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5545>forgive<s%> her.

Every <S%H5088>vow<s%>, and every <S%H632>binding<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%>, her <S%H376>husband<s%> may <S%H6965>establish<s%> it, or her <S%H376>husband<s%> may make it <S%H6565>void<s%>.

But if her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H2790>altogether<s%> hold his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%>; then he <S%H6965>establisheth<s%> all her <S%H5088>vows<s%>, or all her <S%H632>bonds<s%>, which are upon her: he <S%H6965>confirmeth<s%> them, because he held his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heard<s%> them.
But if he shall any <S%H6565>ways<s%> make them <S%H6565>void<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that he hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> them; then he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> her <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

These are the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, between a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%>, between the <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, being yet in her <S%H5271>youth<s%> in her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.
